reviewText: The DVD's are perfect. Play very well in our DVD player. Hubby loves the show and was surprised to find the DVD's were for hour long episodes. So even though some were part of what he has already seen, he saw a more expanded version!

The crew of Buffalo Airways is back for a fourth season of arctic aviation adventures.  There are thirteen episodes on the three discs.  Five episodes are on discs one and two.  Disc three has three episodes and four uncensored short features.  There is "rampie" drama,  rough landings, battles with bureaucrats, celebrities show up, aviation history is saved, water bombers are delivered to overseas buyers, and people move on.
Season 2, disk 1 was damaged and skipped over a section..., disk package was also damaged..
The DVD skipped a bit in the beginning, but the show is great!

I have purchased 4 seasons of this really great show, I have had to return 2 of the 4 (3 and 4) because of the poor quality of the content. Its all broken up, If you order a copy ,save the shipping package, you will need it to return the item.
Vintage aircraft photography is superb.  That alone is worth every penny.
This is a good series for us airplane lovers.  It's too darned expensive, but it is worth it.
Brilliant DVDs and brilliant delivery time.
want to get next season soon
bought as a gift; arrived in excellent gift
Great show.  Really enjoy the series.
You will get this series If you are pilot. One of the best production about aviation in severe weather condition.
